entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Periods of rain south of Green Bay this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:42 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 09:42 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
